Serialized Form

  • Package actor

    • Class actor.Actor extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException
          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        • writeObject

          private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream out)
                  throws java.io.IOException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty name
          stores the actual Actor's name, for example, "Gandalf the Gray"

        • strength

          javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty strength
          influences degree of damage inflicted in skirmish with other players; stored in a SimpleDoubleProperty to implement the Observable design pattern.

        • health

          javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty health
          influences ability to survive damage inflicted in skirmish with other players; can also influence mobility (along with speed); stored in a SimpleDoubleProperty to implement the Observable design pattern.

        • speed

          javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty speed
          influences speed of movement; stored in a SimpleDoubleProperty to implement the Observable design pattern.

        • armyAllegiance

          Army armyAllegiance
          Used to assist in finding nearest opposing Actor; this ActorArmy search the opposing Army, thus the Army will need to know who the opposing Army is, but that's the Army responsibility.

        • tt

          javafx.animation.TranslateTransition tt
          Used to manage the avatar motion under JavaFX.

        • tooltip

          javafx.scene.control.Tooltip tooltip
          Is associated with the avatar and is used to display on-screen information about the Actor object.

    • Class actor.Elf extends Actor implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException
          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        • writeObject

          private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream out)
                  throws java.io.IOException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

      • Serialized Fields

        • hasInvisibilityCloak

          boolean hasInvisibilityCloak
          Directly changes the visibility of this object; if true, this Elf object cannot be seen by others.

        • avatar

          javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle avatar
          This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Elf it will be Rectangle.

    • Class actor.Hobbit extends Actor implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

                  throws java.io.IOException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

      • Serialized Fields

        • stealth

          javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty stealth
          Influences the visibility of this object; sufficiently high stealth means Hobbit object cannot be seen by others.

        • avatar

          javafx.scene.shape.Circle avatar
          This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Hobbit it will be Circle.

    • Class actor.Wizard extends Actor implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException
          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        • writeObject

          private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream out)
                  throws java.io.IOException
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

      • Serialized Fields

        • PROBABILITY_WIZARD_HAS_STAFF

          double PROBABILITY_WIZARD_HAS_STAFF
          Probability used in generating a true/false boolean value for hasStaff 0.8

        • PROBABILITY_WIZARD_HAS_HORSE

          double PROBABILITY_WIZARD_HAS_HORSE
          Probability used in generating a true/false boolean value for hasHorse 0.25

        • hasStaff

          boolean hasStaff
          Gives extra power in combat, and extra speed in moving

        • hasHorse

          boolean hasHorse
          Results in extra speed in moving

        • avatar

          javafx.scene.image.ImageView avatar
          This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Wizard it will be ImageView based on a .GIF file that has an animated image of a wizard.
